text: Yetiya te'omloke da'udara ocarata praraesa karaile, tetiya te'om te'omlokaka dekhi bhaya khale. Te'omloke kaâ€™le, â€˜bhaya nakaraiba, ami duta bibadamana paksa. Amara ijane sijanara oparata simalanghana karaiche, eteke apuni amara majata n'yaya bicara karai diyaka, abicara nakaraiba arau amaka sathika patha pradarsana karaka
